entry.title: Layoffs Hit Struggling Crypto Fitness App STEPN
entry.summary: The “move-to-earn” app is reportedly releasing over 100 contract workers as it goes through a "transitional period."

entry.title: Bitcoin Mining Reserves Are at a 12-Year Low—Here’s Why
entry.summary: Bitcoin mining reserves have dropped to just 1.91 million BTC, the lowest level since February 2010.

entry.title: Crypto.com Follows Binance Into France, Invests $145M in Paris HQ
entry.summary: The company last month received regulatory approval to register in France as a digital asset service provider.

entry.title: Regulators Are Targeting Stablecoins Due to ‘Crazy Product Market Fit’: Compound’s Robert Leshner
entry.summary: Stablecoins do what Bitcoin was expected to do, argues Leshner, adding that “if left to their own devices, they will win and conquer everything.”

entry.title: BNB Chain Upgrade Restores Cross-Chain Transfers Following Binance Bridge Hack
entry.summary: The Moran hard fork seeks to amend several issues on the BNB Chain stemming from its $100 million hack last week.

entry.title: Mango Hacker Uses Stolen Funds to Pit Community Against Developers
entry.summary: The Mango Market hacker is now using looted governance tokens to vote in the project’s DAO about how best to resolve the hack.

entry.title: Custodia’s Caitlin Long Blasts Fed Over BNY Mellon Entering Crypto
entry.summary: The Custodia Bank CEO accused the Fed of hypocrisy for inaction on her bank's master account application as Federal Reserve-supervised BNY Mellon launches crypto custody.

entry.title: How Binance Is Training Law Enforcement Around the World to Combat Crypto Crime
entry.summary: Crypto exchange Binance has built a specialist team to teach law enforcement officers about the ins and outs of cryptocurrency.

entry.title: Arbitrum’s Owners Acquire Key Ethereum Development Team
entry.summary: Offchain Labs today announced the purchase of Prysmatic Labs, consolidating two major Ethereum players.

entry.title: 'No Justification' for SEC to Deny Bitcoin Trust Conversion Into ETF: Grayscale
entry.summary: Grayscale slammed the SEC for not applying its standards evenly to spot Bitcoin ETFs and Bitcoin futures-based ETFs.

entry.title: Layer-1 Blockchains Solana, Cardano, Avalanche Down 8% Over the Week
entry.summary: As the crypto bear market’s grip tightens, several major Layer-1 coins are down heavily in the last seven days.

entry.title: Solana DeFi Trading Platform Mango Markets Loses $100M in Hack
entry.summary: The latest hack comes less than a week after BNB Chain lost $100 million.

entry.title: Crypto Bankruptcies Have Generated a Wave of New Accounting Clients for Armanino
entry.summary: The chill on stablecoins has thawed, Armanino told Decrypt, as banks have again started exploring issuing their own.

entry.title: An ‘Open, Interoperable’ Metaverse is ‘Better for Everyone’: Meta’s Mark Zuckerberg
entry.summary: Zuckerberg reiterated that Meta won’t build the metaverse alone, but stopped short of saying the firm will fully embrace Web3 technologies.

entry.title: OpenSea Adds Avalanche NFT Support
entry.summary: The largest NFT marketplace now offers art on seven blockchains, including the “smol” world of Avalanche.

entry.title: How a Web3 Data Storage Startup Got Microsoft to Invest
entry.summary: The Space and Time CEO reveals why Microsoft backed a decentralized data warehouse during a bear market.

entry.title: Metaplex Token Plunges 68% After Adding Solana NFT Collectors to Airdrop
entry.summary: The MPLX token hit a new low price just weeks after launch, hours after Metaplex offered up 40 million tokens for NFT buyers.

entry.title: SEC Rejects WisdomTree Bitcoin Spot ETF Application—Again
entry.summary: The denial comes after two delays and a prior ruling against BZX on the same grounds.

entry.title: You Can Now Google the Balances of Ethereum Addresses
entry.summary: The new feature saves searchers a visit to Etherscan, returning balances directly in your search results.

entry.title: ApeCoin Sinks 10% After Report of SEC Probe Into Bored Apes Creator Yuga Labs
entry.summary: Some APE holders are cashing out following word that the SEC is probing Yuga Labs over potential securities violations.

entry.title: Treasury Fines Crypto Exchange Bittrex $53 Million for Sanctions Violations
entry.summary: Bittrex violated multiple sanctions programs and failed to adequately guard against money laundering, according to the Treasury Department.

entry.title: SEC Investigating Bored Ape Creator Yuga Labs Over Securities Violations: Report
entry.summary: Yuga Labs is reportedly being investigated over the sale of Bored Ape NFTs and distribution of ApeCoin.

entry.title: BNY Mellon Launches Bitcoin, Ethereum Custody Services for Investment Firms
entry.summary: The BNY Mellon crypto custody service means the bank will store clients' private keys and provide bookkeeping on their BTC and ETH.

entry.title: Google Cloud to Let Users Pay With Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin via Coinbase
entry.summary: Google will let a "handful" of customers pay for its cloud services using cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum via Coinbase Commerce.

entry.title: Bitcoin Lightning Network Misses Block After Enormous Multi-Sig Transaction
entry.summary: A validation bug caused by a complex multi-sig transaction temporarily disrupted a popular implementation of Bitcoin’s Lightning Network.

entry.title: 'Quantum-Resistant' Blockchain QANplatform Suffers Bridge Hack for Over $1 Million
entry.summary: In the early hours of the morning, QANPlatform's Ethereum bridge smart contract was exploited for over $1 million.

entry.title: Coinbase Beats Out Binance, Lands Regulatory Approval in Singapore
entry.summary: Coinbase beat out other large firms to provide crypto services in the city-state, which continues to send mixed messages to crypto firms.

entry.title: CNN Pulls Plug on Web3, NFT Project Vault
entry.summary: The abrupt closure of CNN’s crypto venture led some users to call the move a “rug pull” after the cable network promised future NFT drops.

entry.title: Dogecoin, SHIB Post More Losses as Crypto Market Sheds $11B Overnight
entry.summary: As the crypto market shed another $11 billion, Dogecoin and SHIB have been hit hard, with the meme coins suffering hefty losses overnight.

entry.title: DeGods Solana NFT Collection Joins Zero Royalty Bandwagon
entry.summary: The popular Solana NFT brand becomes the latest collection to switch to a royalty-free scheme.

entry.title: G20 to Review Crypto Regulation Framework This Week
entry.summary: Wild West no more? International leaders are working to sync up cross-border crypto regulation.

entry.title: Ethereum Supply Turns Deflationary—But Price Still Struggles
entry.summary: Despite a gas-guzzling token launch over the weekend, ETH’s price is still slipping.

entry.title: Circle’s USDC Stablecoin Has Lost All Its Post-Terra Gains
entry.summary: USDC has lost 12% from its market cap since Binance announced last month that it would auto-convert exchange balances to its own BUSD stablecoin.

entry.title: Portugal Plans to Impose 28% Tax on Crypto Gains
entry.summary: Starting next year, Portugal may no longer be a tax haven for crypto investors.

entry.title: EU Lawmakers Pass Landmark Crypto Assets Regulation Bill
entry.summary: The Markets in Crypto Assets regulation bill (MiCA) is one step closer to being put into law.

entry.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founder: Take the Web3 Out of Marketing Web3 Games
entry.summary: Vance Spencer discusses crypto regulations, DeFi investing, and the stigma of blockchain gaming.

entry.title: EU Commission to Study Real-Time Monitoring of DeFi Activity on Ethereum
entry.summary: The executive arm of the European Union wants to study Ethereum data.

entry.title: Uniswap, Aave Pile Into Polygon's Speedy Rollup Testnet for Ethereum
entry.summary: Polygon rolled out its first public testnet for its rollup solution zkEVM, with blue-chip DeFi projects Uniswap and Aave jumping on board.

entry.title: Transit Swap DeFi Hacker Bags $690,000 Bounty After Returning $2.75M
entry.summary: The main hacker behind the Transit Swap attack has returned another $2.75 million in stolen funds, bagging a hefty bounty along the way.

entry.title: Bitcoin Mining Difficulty Jumps 14%, Hitting All-Time High
entry.summary: Monday’s difficulty hike is the single largest since May when it rose by 22%.

entry.title: gm: All Things Solana With Anatoly Yakovenko
entry.summary: Solana has had a year of amazing growth—but also multiple network outages. Co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the outages, what's next for Solana at its upcoming Breakpoint event, how it competes with Ethereum, how long he expects the bear market to last, what's happening with NFTs on Solana, and much more. Watch Episode 20 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 3: Where Is Do Kwon?
entry.summary: In this episode of Decrypt-Os, Sander Lutz is back on the street to search for Terra co-founder Do Kwon after Interpol issued a "red notice." His search takes him to the home of a former CIA agent for guidance, and to the place where everyone missing goes to hide out: the mall.

entry.title: The DeFi Governance Conundrum: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick at SmartCon 2022
entry.summary: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick spoke with Decrypt's Dan Roberts all about DeFi governance and its challenges, his problems with voting platforms like Snapshot, DAO fatigue, regulation and the SEC, and stablecoins onstage at Chainlink SmartCon 2022.

entry.title: How Web3 Data Storage Startup Space and Time Scored Microsoft Investment
entry.summary: Space and Time CEO Nate Holiday joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Space and Time's data storage business, how it got investment from Microsoft, and why crypto-native businesses are looking for alternatives to big centralized cloud providers.

entry.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founder: 3 Paths for DeFi Investment Right Now
entry.summary: Framework Ventures co-founder Vance Spencer joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the three paths for DeFi, why crypto VCs are all talking about NFTs and gaming right now, and whether crypto startups should be concerned about regulation.

entry.title: Compound Founder: Stablecoins Have 'Crazy Traction' and Do What Bitcoin Was Expected to Do
entry.summary: Compound founder Robert Leshner joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the shift Compound has seen in borrowing demands and how it has adjusted accordingly, why he believes stablecoins "will win and conquer everything," and how regulators are approaching the space.

entry.title: How Armanino Performs Proof of Reserves: Clayton Lowery at SmartCon 2022
entry.summary: Clayton Lowery of Armanino LLP joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Armanino conducts its "proof of reserves" audits of crypto lenders like Nexo, how to foresee the next crypto company meltdown, trust in Tether, and scrutiny of stablecoins.

entry.title: Crypto Policy Crystal Ball: Coinbase, Haun Ventures, and Crypto Council for Innovation at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Regulation and policy is going to be the factor that most meaningfully shapes the crypto industry in the next few years. On a panel at Messari Mainnet 2022, Coinbase US policy chief Kara Calvert, Haun Ventures chief policy officer Tomicah Tillemann, and Crypto Council for Innovation CEO Sheila Warren gazed into the policy crystal ball with Decrypt's Dan Roberts.

entry.title: Why NEAR Founder Illia Polosukhin Is Bullish on Sweatcoin and Other Social Dapps
entry.summary: Near Protocol founder Illia Polosukhin joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about what's being built on Near's blockchain, real-life use cases for DeFi including Sweatcoin, and how crypto continues to help Ukraine, where Polosukhin is from.

entry.title: How DeFi Chain Is 'Bringing DeFi Back to Bitcoin': DeFi Chain Accelerator Founder
entry.summary: Santiago Sabater, founder of DeFi Chain Accelerator, joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about how DeFi Chain supports smart contracts on a proof-of-stake fork of the Bitcoin blockchain.

entry.title: How Gitcoin Has Given Millions of Dollars in Crypto to Worthy Projects: Azeem Khan at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Gitcoin's fundraising and partnerships lead Azeem Khan tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Gitcoin grants work, the importance of community voting, and continuing to give out grants even through the bear market.

entry.title: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick: Regulation Will Fork DeFi Projects Into Two Camps
entry.summary: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to give his views on regulation and the SEC, how DeFi projects will split between compliant and non-compliant and that it's "ideologically confusing" but "not necessarily a bad thing."

entry.title: Bringing Institutions to Crypto: Christine Moy of Apollo, David Mercer of LMAX at SALT NY
entry.summary: Christine Moy of Apollo Global, formerly of JPMorgan, and David Mercer of LMAX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at SALT NY for a talk on institutional crypto investing and what hurdles remain to broader adoption amid the crypto bear market.

entry.title: Polygon Studios Metaverse Lead: JPEGs Are 'Not the Future of Web3 and NFTs'
entry.summary: Brian Trunzo, metaverse lead at Polygon Studios, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 why he's bullish on metaverse fashion, how big brands are thinking about it, why the future of NFTs will be in gaming and not "right-click save JPEGs," and why he doesn't think the visual graphics of the metaverse need to dramatically improve necessarily.

entry.title: Balcony DAO Is Fractionalizing Investment in a New Jersey Building as an NFT
entry.summary: Balcony DAO co-founder John Belitsky tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how Balcony DAO is fractionalizing real estate investment using NFTs starting with 20 Third Avenue in Long Branch, NJ, and why it's waiting to launch its token as a registered security with the SEC.

entry.title: Fantom Foundation CEO: Multiple Blockchains Will Succeed—But Not 20 of Them
entry.summary: Fantom Foundation CEO Michael Kong tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how the Layer-1 blockchain competes with Ethereum and other chains, how it's a multi-chain future, how people misunderstood what the Ethereum merge was going to mean, and how to onboard more people into Web3.

entry.title: Why Izzy Howell Left Solana Derivatives Protocol Cypher to Launch an NFT Apparel Brand
entry.summary: Izzy Howell, a former core contributor at Solana derivatives protocol Cypher, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 what she's up to now: a streetwear and lifestyle brand called PussyDAO that will soon launch Solana NFTs tied to physical apparel.

entry.title: Meghan Heintz of Dune Analytics: Crypto Bear Market Makes the Scammers Move On
entry.summary: Meghan Heintz, data scientist at Dune Analytics, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how Dune works, how its user-created data dashboards have a social element, the surprising benefit of the crypto bear market, and what she says to crypto skeptics.

entry.title: Prasanna Loganathar of Cake DeFi: Biggest Misconception About Crypto Is It's Less Safe Than TradFi
entry.summary: Prasanna Loganathar is the head of engineering at Cake DeFi, which is built atop DeFi Chain, a proof-of-stake network for dapps built on a fork of the Bitcoin blockchain. He tells Decrypt’s Jason Nelson in our Decrypting Mainnet booth at Mainnet 2022 (sponsored by DeFi Chain) about how DeFi Chain works, how it's possible to layer proof-of-stake on top of Bitcoin, and the biggest misconceptions about DeFi that he'd like to see go away in 2023.

entry.title: Polygon Co-Founder Talks Imminent Launch of zkEVM at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Polygon co-founder Mihailo Bjelic tells Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about why Polygon zkEVM will be the future of Ethereum scaling, how Polygon is "an un-opinionated platform" and how the Ethereum merge affected Polygon.
